name: Competition (wip)
description:
Currently a work in progress. Only for Basic Presentation purposes.

 - the game was NOT meant for Itch - needs some modifications for it to work well on that aspect ratio.

Multiplayer does not work for Web GL

HOW TO PLAY - Once you hit play and the scene loads, Depending on the chosen game, either:

-> swipe down on the lower half of the screen to make your horse move (the more you slide the faster you run)

-> click on the moving bubbles to make your horse move (the more you pop the faster you run)
